templates.name: quick_unlock
steps: Go to {product_page_url} and select your plan
Add the promo code {code} in the discount field
Confirm the discount is applied to your total
Complete payment to unlock access

templates.name: full_walkthrough
templates.description: Detailed guide with verification at each stage
steps: Visit the official {product_name} page
Browse the available membership tiers and compare features
Select the plan that matches your needs
Look for the promo code or discount field during checkout
Enter {code} and click apply
Verify the discount appears in your order summary
Complete the checkout process to finalize your subscription

templates.name: checkout_focused
templates.description: Emphasizes the checkout and code application process
steps: Navigate to {product_name}'s signup page
Choose your preferred tier or plan
Proceed to checkout and locate the coupon field
Apply code {code} to see your savings
Submit payment to complete enrollment

templates.name: account_setup_first
templates.description: Leads with account creation before applying discount
steps: Head to {product_name} and create your account
Verify your email if required
Log in and explore the available plans
Select the membership level you want
At checkout, enter promo code {code}
Confirm and pay to activate your membership

templates.name: mobile_journey
steps: Open {product_page_url} on your device
Tap on the plan you want to join
Find the promo code box at checkout
Enter {code} and tap Apply
Complete your purchase

templates.name: code_first_approach
templates.description: Prioritizes having the code ready before starting
steps: Copy the code {code} before you begin
Go to {product_name} and pick your plan
Paste the code at checkout
Pay the discounted price

templates.name: verification_heavy
templates.description: Multiple confirmation points for cautious users
steps: Visit the {product_name} offer page
Review the plan details and pricing before proceeding
Add your chosen plan to cart
Enter code {code} and verify it's accepted
Check that the final price reflects the discount
Complete the secure checkout

templates.name: streamlined_process
steps: Access {product_name}
Select a plan
Use code {code} at checkout
Finish your order
